title: Ultimate TV logotype ID
content:
This is some pretty sweet work done on the Ultimate TV logotype. Any chance this is available? If custom, similar typeface options appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829123124im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ultimate_4192.gif)
author: CreativeNRG

comments.content: The letterforms follow the general pattern of Maiandra Bold, if you stretch, skew it and fiddle with it a bit...
Thanks so much for the insight Nick.
